name: upTailor
overview:
Online provider of hand tailored men’s dress shirts.

upTailor.com - “The World’s Premier Custom Clothier” was created by long established tailor LUTES Shirtmaker. LUTES Shirtmaker created upTailor to bring its service online. With offices and workshops in Singapore and Bangkok they offer individually hand tailored men’s dress shirts that customers order online.

Customers follow the online ordering and measuring process. First, selecting various styles of collars, cuffs, fits, then proceed to take then enter their exact personal measurements. Shirt prices range from 57 - 67 USD. Flat rate registered shipping is offered at a competitive 7 USD per shirt.

upTailor differentiates its business from the competition by the backing of premier established shirtmaker.

www.upTailor.com summarizes their services as follows:

We provide individually tailor made shirts- measured and shaped to fit your body. All done through our online measuring and ordering process
